replies.body:
Go on my phone, disable WiFi + Data, and play all the apps I have. :3

Alternatively, I would either read, or play games on my DS/Wii/Gamecube/etc.

replies.body:
How many posts have you got out there DaBaderMC?!
hahaha nah its nice to see more interaction :)

Anyways if i had no internet as of this very moment, i would probably shoot and edit videos on my laptop with my camera, work on my school project i had to do over summer, and hang out with a friend, and DEFINITELY jump in the pool (over here in  Western Australia its a consistent 35+ degrees Celsius in summer :O)
